member.name: CREATE_DISK_GPT
member.summary: Contains information used by theIOCTL_DISK_CREATE_DISK control code to initialize GUID partition table (GPT) disks.

member.name: CREATE_DISK_GPT.DiskId
member.summary: The disk identifier (GUID) of the GPT disk to be initialized.

member.name: CREATE_DISK_GPT.MaxPartitionCount
member.summary: The maximum number of partitions allowed on the GPT disk to be initialized without repartitioning the disk.
